attributes.action: Demand that the contract to show the FA Cup on terrestrial TV is taken from ITV due to the mess they have made of live and highlight coverage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This years coverage of one of the most important football events in the world is an absolute mess due to ITV. In the Live coverage of Histon verses Leeds UTD the match could not be watched due to poor camera work. The replay of Everton verses Liverpool included an advert break during the only goal of the match. The Highlights programme is a complete and utter meess, focusing on the pundits, build up and adverts with the absolute minimum of football shown.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
